com.hci.geotagger.activities
Class EditProfileActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.hci.geotagger.common.BaseActivity
          com.hci.geotagger.activities.EditProfileActivity

public class EditProfileActivity
extends com.hci.geotagger.common.BaseActivity

This class allows a user to modify their Profile information. This includes location, a small "About Me" blurb their favorite quote, and an email address.

loadImage

private void loadImage(String imgUrl)
load the tag's image from the url into the image view

Parameters:
imgUrl - The uri of the image associated with the users profile

saveChanges

private void saveChanges()
Saves users edited profile information to server. This includes the image the user selected, favorite quote text, location text, and description text. This is done with AccountHandler class.

openCamera

private void openCamera()
Opens the camera to allow user to take a picture

openGallery

private void openGallery()
Open the device's gallery to allow the user to select an image

uploadImage

private String uploadImage(File f)
Uploads a scaled image to the server and sets the url. Take care of the url returned, and whether it points to production server or development server

Parameters:
f -
Returns:
